title: Project CARS 2 - Spirit of Le Mans + DLCs
description:
Release date: 2017
Genre: Racing, Simulator, 3D
Developer: Slightly Mad Studios
Publisher: BANDAI NAMCO Entertainment
Publication Type: RePack
Language: RUS | ENG | Multi11
Language of voice: ENG
Crack: CODEX

Project Cars 2 - this is the second part of the mega-successful racing simulator from the company Slightly Mad Studios. Two years later, the developers will finally please all fans of this genre with a sequel that promises to be an icon in the world of racing. So, what awaits us .... Huge selection of tracks: more than 50 unique locations and more than 200 tracks. Gravel, trails, snow, mud, dynamic weather and time changes - all this will make you travel the same track every time in a new way. At the choice of the player will appear 8 different disciplines, including the Rally Cross, 200+ cars, including concepts that have not been seen, as well as racing cars that have been denied access to the competition. You can create madness both in single-player and multiplayer modes.

DLCs : 

Season Pass
Season Pass Bonus
Japanese Cars Bonus Pack
Porsche Legends Pack
Fun Pack
Spirit of Le Mans Pack

How to play :

Mount
Install
Play
